actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Criminal Code to prohibit former Members of Congress from using seals, flags, license tags, or other insignia or devices which imply they are currently Members of Congress.

summary.text: Prohibits former Members of Congress from using seals, flags, license tags, or other insignia or devices which imply they are currently Members of Congress. Imposes a five dollar fine for each offense. (Adds 18 U.S.C. 918)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Criminal Code to prohibit former Members of Congress from using seals, flags, license tags, or other insignia or devices which imply they are currently Members of Congress.
